Installation from scratch
=========================

Linux
-----

**Debian**::

	$ su
	# apt-get install python2.7 python-qt4 python-lxml
	# apt-get install make pyqt4-dev-tools
	$ cd afefuc
	$ make


Mac OS
------

Using backports::

	port qt4
	port py27-pyqt4
	pip lmxl

Use ``pyuic4`` to generate GUI.


MS Windows
----------

Download:
	* Python 2.7 (Python + setuptools + pypm is available at http://www.activestate.com/activepython)
Install:
	* Python 2.7
	* PyQT and lxml::

		pypm install pyqt4
		pypm install lxml

Use ``pyuic4`` to generate GUI.
